content:
Chinthicchen kuzhiyathil veenavareppol-haale...
Thunayattoru narane-ppolaayu njaan.

mruthiyaarnnore!-saubhaagyam
ningalkkuththaana-tthinte naalil.
Ulkkondoruyirin-thirumeyyum
mochanamekum thirurakthamathum
ningale nirttheetum-valabhaage.

vegam vannettheetenam
naathaa! Nin dayayen mumpil
en jeevaanthuyamatukkumpol
ennaathmaavin karmmangal pra
thidaanam netitumpol
thunayaakillen nettangal.
Ponninu vilayillavitengum
angishaayaam deveshan
vidhipeedtatthilirikkunnu.
Dhanikanu deenathayillenkil
dhanamaalambam nalkilla.
Deenanu shuddhathayillenkil
deenathayum thunayekeetaa.
Satthamane naravathsalane!
Avitenmel daya thonnaname-
arththiccheetunnen menmel.

msheehaa raajaave! Sho-kam
klesham mru-thi ivayeshaattha
/tshaashvatha jeevasthaanatthil
/tparishuddhanmaarotoppam
daasaathmaakkalkkaashvaa-sam
mamgalapoorvvam nalkenam.

naam dyvaathmajaraayi-taan
vaazhchayilu-padeshicchoraam
/tjanakanmaareyorkkenam
/tdyvathanoojan svarggatthil
aashvaasam punyaathmaa-kkal-
kkoppamavar-kkekeeta-tte.

po-vuka sahajaa-the!
Bhoovaasam-nirasiccho-le!
Aa-raajakumaa-ran
paarppikkum maniyara tha-nnil.
/tnee-vee-ttaareyum
/tsuthareyum verpettenkil
vaa-navarute naattil
ninneyavan-nivasippikkum.

Koottaayu nin slee-baa
bheekaramaam katavathilaarnnu
paa-zhirulin se-naa
nivahatthe paayikkatte.
/tslee-baa-tthaakkolaal
/tparudeesin vaathilileree-
ttaa-nandatthaa-l njaan
nin krupaye vaazhttheetatte.

krupa nirayum mashihaa!-mruthayaam nin daasi-
kkuththaanam nalki-navyathayum svargge  modavume-ke-nam.

Kannukalil kanneer-shruthikalilaaraavam
ayyamvili vaayil-vyathayakame naathaa! Nalkanamaa-shvaa-sam.

praarththippin priyare en-per-
kkellaayppo-zhumenne orppin.
/tnjaan mruthiyaal verpettenen
/tpaapatthe ortthanchunnen
ee praarththanayaal njaan-ne-tum
pinkoorirulil samra-ksha

punyam cheytholaam daa-see!
Shlomo nalkaan vanneetu-
/tnneerenmaar, parudeesaayil
/tnirmmalamaam, ninnaathmatthe
pookikkum santhoshi-kkum
dhaarmmikaro-ppam nee vaa-nil.

deveshaa! En maa-rggatthil
koottaayu ninnaa slee-baayaal
/ten jee-van kaatthee-tenam.
/tkartthaave! Nyaayattheerppil
skkeeppaamel moshtaaveppo-la
npaa-lenne vaa--nam.

raahel maranamatanjappol
yaakkobavale sam-skaaram
/tcheytha-dhikam khedam-poondaan.
/tee mruthiye prathi ke-zhendaa.
Jeevan nalkumaval-kkullil
sthithamaam-thirumeyu ra-ktha-ngal.

Sathyan-maartthaa mariyaam than-sodaranaa-kum
lovo-sar cheenjennaalum-jeevan-kalppicchon.
Nee che-nnappol yaayeero-sutha jeevi-cchaal
mrutharanthuyatthil jeevikkum-ninnaa-hvaanatthaal.

mruthasa-nkethe manmayanaa-maadaamo-taayu
niyamam-thalliya-manmayane-khedi-kkendaa nee;
mruthiyum-jeevanumekeetum-dyvasuthan-njaa-
nenno-thiya bahubalavaanaam-svarggeeyan sathyan.

chaathuryatthotu bhuvanatthe-marananuka-tthil
bandhi-cchoru vijnjan srashtaa-vunna-thanaayu mevum
nrupare-padavikalil ninnum bheekaramaa-kum
vidhika-rtthaakkale bharanatthil-ninnum - neekkunnu.

Thruppaa-vana thanuvotuyirin-rudhiravume-ttoru
vishvaa-sikal mrutharettitumee dhoopa-tthaal punyam.
Jeeva-pradanaam mashihaa nin-dyvikamaam vala-
bhaaga-tthavar nilakondange-sthuthi-paa-teetatte.

/tdyvame! Ninte krupayin prakaaram... Haale
snehamotetthiya salputhraa-mruthiyettone!
Njangale randaam mruthiyeennum kanivaal kaakka.

/tente anyaayatthilninnu.... Haaleluyyaa
kriyakalkkoppam sakalarkkum-phalamekumpol
neethi nimittham vidhigeham-bahubheethikaram.

/tninakku virodhamaayitthanne... Haaleluyyaa
ninnute neethiye en dosham-lamghicchenkil
njaan narakattheennozhiyum nin-varasampatthaal.

/tennaal neethiyil nee ishtappettu... Haaleluyyaa
anuthaapatthinnangitami-llennevam njaan
kelppathinaalen sodarare! Khedikkunnen.

/tninte aanandavum santhoshavum... Haaleluyyaa
mruthiyaal mruthare mruthareennum maayicchone!
Eesho nrupathe! Nin krupaye vaazhtthum njangal.

/tdyvame! Vetippulla hrudayatthe... Haaleluyyaa
jeevanuyirppil sakalarkkum - nalkaan mruthanaayu
jeevicchone! Sakaleshaa-thmajane sthothram.

/tennaalo nin്re aanandavum... Haaleluyyaa
valiya velicchamudicchallo-mruthalokatthil
asthikalinmelaashisaam-panineer thooki.

/ten്re rakshayute dyvamaaya... Haaleluyyaa
mruthalokatthil sleebaayen - koottaakatte
vellumuyirppil dushtane njaan-maranattheyum.

/tenthennaal balikalil... Haalelooyyaa
maranatthin kaattatiyetten jeevan maanju
nin sathyaathmaavetthi eni-kkunarvvekatte.

/tninte ishtatthaal sehiyonotu... Haaleluyyaa
kabareennuyirotu parudeesil-ninne ettum
thaathaathmaja vimalaathmaavi-nnennum sthothram.
kartthaavinte bhavanatthilekku naam pokunnu ennu avar ennotu paranjappol njaan santhoshicchu.

ningalil ninnen-priyare! Piriyunnen
sveekaranam njaan netaanarththippin.
oorshleme, ente kaalukal nin്re vaathilukalil nilkkunnu.
kottayaal chuttappettirikkunna pattanam pole oorshlem paniyappetti rikkunnu.
avitekku gothrangal, kartthaavin്re gothrangal thanne, israaye linte saakshuyatthinaayi kartthaavin്re naamatthe sthothram cheyvaan kayaricchellunnu.

mruthiye kashtam-saatthaane! Kashtam
ningate bharanam-mishihaa maayikkum.
avite nyaayaasanangal, daaveedugruhatthile nyaayaasanangal thanne, sthithicheyyunnu.
oorshleminte kushalam anveshippin, nin്re snehithanmaar dhyrya maayirikkatte. Ninte kotthalangalil samaadhaanavum nin്re kottaaranga lil samthrupthiyum undaakatte.
ente sahodaranmaarum snehithanmaarum nimittham ninnil samaadhaanam undaakatte ennu njaan parayum. Nammute dyvamaaya kartthaavinte aalayam nimittham njaan nin്re nanma anveshikkum.

aardrathayaal naathaa devaa!
Daasikkekaname punyam
nin mahimodayanaal thannil
nirtthaname valamaayivale.

Nettatthe nettakkaarkkum
veetine vaaaarkkum vitten
deveshaa en maarggatthil
nee koottaayu ninneetenam.

Orkkenne mashihaa mannaa!
Nee ghosham vanneetumpol
eeyaathmaavinnaashvaasam
dharmmishdtarkkoppam nalka.

Aardrathayaal naathaa devaa!
Daasikkekaname punyam
nin mahimodaya naal thannil
nirtthaname valamaayivale.
